summary: The International Statistical Classification of Diseases and Related Health Problems 10th Revision  is list of codes that classify diseases and medical problems.
full_text: The International Statistical Classification of Diseases and Related Health Problems 10th Revision  is a coding of diseases and signs, symptoms, abnormal findings, complaints, social circumstances and external causes of injury or diseases, as classified by the World Health Organization . This page contains ICD-10 Chapter IX: Diseases of the circulatory system.
title: ICD-10 Chapter I
